name: Solitaire Tripeaks Homescapes
description:
Hello, Solitaire Master!

Welcome to the most popular SOLITAIRE game!

This is Free Card Games at its best!
This is a FREE SOLITAIRE Classic game applicable to Any Ages!
It is a FREE SOLITAIRE Classic TRIPEAKS game designed for Solitaire lovers and every new player -- Easy to play and Full of fun. Solitaire game play can be simple and fast to start but not so easy to master. More and more users are joining us and having hours of fun everyday!

Let me show you our Solitaire Game -Solitaire Classic Tripeaks now!

FEATURES:
- Easy and Fun, you will pick up quick!
- Thousand of fantastic levels – with more on the way!
- Great graphics and amazing, beautiful themes.
- Global Leaderboard - you can compete with players around the world.
- Wield game-changing cards, with magical effects!
- Daily quests, events, activity, challenges, and rewards!
- At the end of each field, harvest your crops for an extra free bonus!
- Uncover hidden Golden Treasures on your journey.
- 5,000 Welcome bonus and Massive Daily coins each day!
- Play Pyramid Solitaire with your facebook friends to earn bonus coins every day

Never played Solitaire or any card games before? No worries. TriPeaks Solitaire is Easy to play! Simply complete a quick tutorial and you'll be a pro in no time! It's a casual, entertaining free card game for everyone to enjoy! What are you waiting for?

Download and Play Solitaire Tripeaks - Farm Homescapes NOW!
